choices.B: network from vpc.flow_record where source.publicnetworк IN ( 'Suspicious IPs' , 'Internet IPs' ) and dest.resource IN ( resource where role IN ( 'LDAP' ) )
choices.C: network from vpc.flow_record where source. publicr.etwork IN ( 'Suspicious IPs' ) and dest.resource IN ( resource where role IN ( 'AWS RDS' , 'Database' ) )
choices.D: network from vpc.flow_record where source.publicnetwork IN ( 'Suspicious IPs' , 'Internet IPs' ) and dest.resource IN ( resource where role IN ( 'AWS RDS' , 'Database' ) )
choices.A: network from vpc.flow_record where dest.resource IN ( resource where role = 'Database')

questions.question_text: Which Resource Query Language (RQL) query monitors all traffic from the internet and suspicious internet protocols (IPs) destined for Amazon Web Services (AWS) databases?

questions.question_text:
An image containing medium vulnerabilities that do not have available fixes is being deployed into the sock-shop namespace. Prisma Cloud has been configured for vulnerability management within the organization's continuous integration (CI) tool and registry.
What will occur during the attempt to deploy this image from the CI tool into the sock-shop namespace?

choices.B: The CI policy will fail the build; therefore, the image will not be deployed.
choices.C: The image will be deployed successfully, and all vulnerabilities will be reported.
choices.A: The image will pass the CI policy, but will be blocked by the deployed policy; therefore, it will not be deployed.
choices.D: The image will be deployed successfully, but no vulnerabilities will be reported.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
【たぶん】
D. config from
【もしかしたら】
A. audit from

questions.question_text:
A Prisma Cloud Administrator has been asked to create a custom policy which notifies the InfoSec team each time a configuration range is made to a Security group.
Which type of Resource Query Language (RQL) query would be used in this policy?
Which type of alert captures unusual user activity and excessive login failures?

choices.D: Explicitly specify the predefined version pattern-matching algorithm.
choices.A: Allow Prisma Cloud to automatically optimize registry scans with version pattern matching.
choices.C: Explicitly specify the Defender to do the job.
choices.B: Allow Prisma Cloud to automatically distribute the scan job across a pool of available Defenders.

questions.question_text: Which two actions are appropriate when configuring Prisma Cloud to scan a registry? (Choose two.)
